short_description: I am a Full-stack programmer and I am ready to implement your business idea!
about_1: I have started learning programming professionally since 2018 and I am still continuing and this cycle continues to infinity ...
about_2: In the beginning, I was trained with online courses (video trainings)...but later I was not limited to this source and I use all sources, including videos, texts, documents, videos, blogs, books, etc. ...
about_3: I love programming in Rust. And I would like the backend of the websites I write to be in this language ... this language is wonderful!
about_4: I like the open source world very much. I love Linux and I program with Linux ... because it gives me more freedom ...
my_address: bonab-e-jadid - Imam St. - Bakhshemandi alley - first ten meters - Fazli house

bootstrap.title: Bootstrap
bootstrap.value: The best and most popular user interface library for fast and responsive site building is undoubtedly Bootstrap ... This library is extremely powerful and extensible and can be customized with Sass ...

javascript.title: Javascript
javascript.value: At the very beginning, I was learning this language in the front-end. But later, at an advanced level, I learned this language and now I use it both in the front-end and in the back-end ...

jquery.title: Jquery
jquery.value: It is one of the most common JavaScript libraries ... This library has an interesting slogan that says: write less, do more! The amount of code written with this library is much less than VanillaJS or raw JavaScript ...

laravel.title: Laravel
laravel.value: Laravel is an incredibly powerful web framework. This framework has extremely high development power ... literally, in the shortest possible time, the most complex projects can be implemented with it ...

linux.title: Linux
linux.value: Linux is a family of Unix-like open source operating systems ... distributions that use the Linux kernel are literally perfect for developers ... it has great security ... all the development tools in it It is up to date and any tool we want is available ...

mysql.title: MySql
mysql.value: It is an open source and powerful database that has been one of the best databases for several years and has left good statistics ... it uses SQL language for its queries and is widely used in web applications ...

php.title: PHP
php.value: The first language I learned when I started programming is PHP. Because php is focused on simplicity and also has a very good community. Also, complex websites can be easily implemented with this lovely language ...

postgresql.title: Postgresql
postgresql.value: An incredibly powerful database, open source and completely free! This database has very good features and uses the SQL language for its queries ... it can store all kinds of advanced information and has excellent performance features that can be compared to expensive databases!

react.title: React
react.value: I use React to create powerful UIs for the web. Also, due to its large community, React has been used in many reputable companies around the world ...

rust.title: Rust
rust.value: I started learning this language in 2022. For this reason, I like this language, which, in addition to being a modern language, produces safe and efficient software and allows me to manage memory. And it also offers performance that can compete with C ...

sass.title: Sass
sass.value: Sass is an incredibly powerful preprocessor for css. In all the projects I write, I use sass instead of css ... the amount of code is extremely less and with the least amount of coding, most things can be done ...

svelte.title: Svelte
svelte.value: Svelte is a wonderful compiler! This compiler produces powerful UIs. The output it produces is extremely light and less bulky than its competitors ... I use this modern compiler to produce light and compact UIs, while having a lot of power ...

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.value: A wonderful and lovely styling tool that provides what it takes to develop an attractive and beautiful site ... We will never reinvent the existing wheel ... Tailwind, basic features required provides for creating themes and makes development faster ...

typescript.title: Typescript
typescript.value: Most of the problems that existed in JavaScript were caused by types ... I use TypeScript in order to produce programs that do not have unexpected errors in the future. I write almost all the projects that I want to write with JavaScript in this language ...

vue.title: Vue
vue.value: Vue is a powerful framework with a very good ecosystem. It is easy to develop and can produce powerful UIs with it. I use this framework in frontend and desktop applications ...

dart.title: Dart
dart.value: Dart was known as an incredibly powerful language for creating UI for any platform. I make mobile applications (android & ios) and desktop applications (windows & mac & linux) from this language and with the help of the Flutter framework.

flutter.title: Flutter
flutter.value: Flutter is an open source framework created by Google for building cross-platform applications. You can have the most beautiful mobile and desktop application at the lowest cost and create a great experience for your users!

wasm.title: WebAssembly
wasm.value: WebAssembly is a low-level language that runs in a binary format in the browser ... one of the distinctive features of this language is its speed ... I write the front-end code of the website with the Rust language and the output from it I get WebAssembly ...

front_end.label: Front-end
front_end.description: We will design your website template in a responsive and user-friendly way with your desired features ...

back_end.label: Back-end
back_end.description: We make the core and brain of your website with the format you like, in a scalable and efficient way ...

telegram_bot.label: Telegram bot
telegram_bot.description: We design functional and customized robots according to your needs using the best methods of robot development ...

mobile_service.label: Mobile Application
mobile_service.description: We are ready to write your business application on Android and iOS mobile platforms!

diploma.label: Diploma
diploma.description: I received my diploma from Shahid Beheshti School in Marand city in the field of mathematics and physics ...
